question: Which B&K 2245 variant is best suited for sound power measurements in a product testing lab?
context: Product Noise Partner supports sound power determination according to ISO 3744 and ISO 3746.
Variants 2245-P-S and 2245-P-SC include the Product Noise Partner software.
These variants include accessories like the Type 4966 microphone and optional calibrator.
Product Noise Partner offers a 3D geometry view and pass/fail indicators for measurement accuracy.
reference: 2245-P-S and 2245-P-SC are best suited for sound power measurements in product testing labs.

question: What software is required on the B&K 2245 to comply with ISO 3744 for sound power testing?
context: Product Noise Partner enables ISO 3744 and ISO 3746 compliant sound power testing.
It is included in the 2245-P-S and 2245-P-SC variants.
reference: Product Noise Partner software is required for ISO 3744-compliant sound power testing.

question: Which B&K 2245 variant is suitable for environmental noise surveys and regulation compliance?
context: Enviro Noise Partner supports environmental noise surveys and regulation compliance.
It enables 1/1- and 1/3-octave band frequency analysis, broadband statistics, and audio recording.
Variants 2245-E-S and 2245-E-SC include the Enviro Noise Partner software.
reference: 2245-E-S and 2245-E-SC are suitable for environmental noise surveys and regulation compliance.

question: What variant should be used for roadside exhaust noise enforcement?
context: Exhaust Noise Partner supports stationary and roadside exhaust noise testing.
It complies with ISO 5130, SAE J1169, J1492, and J1287.
Variants 2245-X-I and 2245-X-LC include the Exhaust Noise Partner software.
reference: 2245-X-I and 2245-X-LC are recommended for roadside exhaust noise enforcement.

question: Which B&K 2245 variant is ideal for occupational noise exposure surveys?
context: Work Noise Partner supports task- and job-based noise exposure assessment according to ISO 9612.
It includes tools for calculating workday exposure and selecting hearing protection.
Variants 2245-W-S and 2245-W-SC include the Work Noise Partner software.
reference: 2245-W-S and 2245-W-SC are ideal for occupational noise exposure surveys.

question: Which B&K 2245 variant is ideal for basic broadband measurements and general sound level checks?
context: Noise Partner is designed for simple broadband measurements and general-purpose sound pressure level checks.
Variants 2245-N-S and 2245-N-SC include the Noise Partner software.
reference: 2245-N-S and 2245-N-SC are ideal for basic broadband measurements and general sound level checks.

question: Can the B&K 2245 be used for logging and audio recording during environmental noise surveys?
context: Enviro Noise Partner supports logging down to 1-second intervals.
It enables high-quality audio recordings for identifying specific incidents.
These features are available in variants with the Enviro Noise Partner license.
reference: Yes, B&K 2245 with Enviro Noise Partner supports logging and audio recording during environmental noise surveys.

question: Is the B&K 2245 suitable for multi-channel sound power measurements?
context: B&K 2245 is a single-channel sound level meter.
It supports 1/1- and 1/3-octave band analysis and broadband measurements.
Multi-channel setups may require additional instrumentation beyond the 2245.
reference: B&K 2245 supports single-channel measurements; multi-channel setups require additional equipment.

question: What accessories are included with the 2245-P-SC variant for product noise testing?
context: 2245-P-SC includes Product Noise Partner software.
Accessories: Type 4231 sound calibrator, Type 4966 microphone, hard-shell case, USB cables, windscreen, wrist strap, mobile phone holder.
reference: 2245-P-SC includes all necessary accessories for product noise testing, including calibrator and microphone.

question: What standards does the Work Noise Partner help comply with?
context: Work Noise Partner supports ISO 9612 for occupational noise exposure assessment.
It helps ensure compliance with regulations and supports hearing protection selection.
reference: Work Noise Partner helps comply with ISO 9612 and supports occupational noise regulation compliance.
